text: Sugitaniella is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. It contains only one species, Sugitaniella kuramana, which is found in Japan (Honshu)., 1933, Insecta Matsumurana 8: 101. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1933 Category:Thyatirinae Category:Monotypic moth genera Category:Moths of Japan Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Sugitaniella
